panels.visual: Val walking through crowds, delivering messages Festival vendors setting up stalls
panels.dialogue: Val (thought bubble): "The Dawn's Crown alignment approaches. The whole citadel buzzes with excitement..."

panels.visual: Prismor on balcony overlooking preparations Crystalline scales catching sunlight
panels.dialogue: Prismor (thought): "Decades I've protected this place. But today... something feels different."

panels.visual: Pocky in library with Marge, looking at old star charts
panels.dialogue: Marge: "Be careful with those, dear. They're older than you think." Pocky: "The alignment happens only once a century. Think of what we might learn!"

panels.visual: Lunara guiding the Yule Tree up mountain path
panels.dialogue: Lunara (thought): "The tree feels... resistant. The Nature Essence isn't flowing as it should."
